name: Side Kick
description:
This page provides details on the martial arts side kick. Side kicks are powerful kicks but tend to be slower than other basic martial arts kicks (i.e. roundhouse kick). For example, a martial artists needs to chamber their kick and then fire out the side kick versus just launching a roundhouse kick directly at the target. Nevertheless, given its power, a side kick can a very effective self-defense weapon. The side kick can be done either with the rear leg (see below) or front leg. For information on other martial arts kicks (i.e. axe kicks), please visit Black Belt Wiki’s main section on Martial Arts Kicks.

Martial arts kicks and all other martial arts techniques should only be practiced under the supervision of a trained martial arts instructor in order to prevent injuries and to ensure the proper technique is utilized. In addition, all martial arts techniques and training should be used safely and responsibly.

Wiki – Best Martial Arts Books
